Returns the number of elements in {{rlpt|mdspan}}.

Equivalent to {{box|{{rlpt|extents}}{{c/core|().}}{{rlpi|extents/fwd-prod-of-extents|fwd-prod-of-extents}}{{c/core|(}}{{rlpt|extents/rank|rank}}{{c/core|())}}}}.

{{cpp/precondition|The size of the multidimensional index space {{rlpf|extents}} must be representable as a value of type {{rlpt|/#Member types|size_type}}.}}

===Return value===
The number of elements.
